cn.jiguang.imui.chatinput.emoji.widget

Class EmojiAsyncLoadTextView

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatTextView
      • cn.jiguang.imui.chatinput.emoji.widget.EmojiAsyncLoadTextView

  • public class EmojiAsyncLoadTextView
extends AppCompatTextView
    the view support to load emoji asynchronously.

    if you want to load emoji asynchronously ,you should use EmojiAsyncLoadTextView. if not, TextView is ok

    Created by sj on 6/7/16.
